column1: Would you like me to make you a hot dog? Yes, please. Poof! You're a hot dog!
Why wouldn't the bald man let anyone use his comb? He couldn't part with it.
Why won't a bike stand up by itself? It's two tired.
Why were the inventors of the airplane correct in thinking they could fly? Because they were Wright.
Why was the teacher cross-eyed? He couldn't control his pupils.
Why was the robot cold? He was missing his winter gear
Why was the musician arrested? He got in treble.
Why was the insect kicked out of the wildlife preserve? It was a litterbug.
Why was the cat afraid of the tree? Because of its bark.
Why was the broom late? Because he overswept.
